name: The Gaia Imperium
description: The Gaia Imperium, humanity's star-spanning civilization, demonstrates rapid adaptability and experimentation prowess, making them a significant cosmic force.

name: The Abyssal Conclave
description: The Abyssal Conclave, aquatic Eridani from Eos and Tethys, are known for their aptitude for experimentation and advancing post-Cosmos Conflicts.

name: The Verdant Mandate
description: Nephiv, an ancient arboreal race excels in terraforming and banking. Survivors of the Wraithen Conflict, they've fortified themselves under King Sylandros' rule. Their goal: the Galactic Throne.

name: The Synaptic Omni-Mind
description: Once known as the Vyrex Empire, the Synaptic Omni-Mind technological telepathy allows them to coordinate with deadly precision. Their cybernetic transformation from extinction stirs both awe and trepidation in the galaxy.

name: The Luminous Collective
description: Home to bioluminescent rainforests, the Luminous Collective is an enlightened society of Kraveena. Their intricate light patterns illuminate conversations while empathic powers shape diplomatic outcomes.

name: The Hegemony of Solitude
description: Stellascytes, masters of the cosmos. They navigate silent, starless seas, shaping lifeless worlds with keen senses and cold precision. In solitude, they plot dominance.

name: The Myriad of the Maelstrom
description: Amid the cosmic theatre of the Prism Nebula, The Myriad of the Maelstrom rises, the voracious Kryzlak, teeming from Zephyria's emerald storm. Masters of destruction, their leviathan armada swarms, leaving ruins of civilizations in their wake.

name: The Exan Crucible
description: Born from a penal colony on the remote Briseis Primus, the Exani Crucible uses their unique vision and resilience to scan and terraform inhospitable worlds. Led by an elected 'Hand', they seek galactic justice.

name: The Phantoms of Heliofen
description: Shadowed within Heliofen's misty marshlands, the Phantoms of Heliofen, spectral Faelidae, balance life between spectral stealth and unyielding resistance. An enigma veiled in cosmic mystery.

name: The Lazurian Legacy
description: Born in icy wastes, the Voltari are a resilient species, unyielding to psionic influence, and masters of frigid colonization. Bearing the Lazurian Legacy, they guard ancient wisdom and ambition, preparing for a galactic resurrection.

name: The Silicate Singularity
description: Born from silicate dust, Orraxians of the Silicate Singularity thrive in harsh landscapes. Once a dying empire, now a technological titan, they carry scars of a virus-riddled past, yet face an uncertain future with resurgent threats.

name: The Omnisentience
description: Cosmic voyagers, the Heligon, thrive in the vacuum of space, harnessing energy from stars. Known as watchers, they guard ancient secrets, their intent unknown.

name: The Biso Combine
description: The Biso Combine are master strategists. Resources were sparse on their homeworld, and as such they learned how to inflict the most damage at the least cost. They know well the value of a well placed fleet and are dangerous foes.

name: The Garan Dominion
description: The Garans are a warrior species of proud, tradition-bound beings who value honor and combat. The aggressive Garan culture makes them an interstellar military power to be respected and feared.

name: The Garan Dominion
description: The Garans are a warrior species of proud, tradition-bound beings who value honor and combat. The aggressive Garan culture makes them an interstellar military power to be respected and feared.

name: Fooyanians
description: The Fooyanians are a fierce race who have made it their mission to win at all costs. The are deadly hunters and will stop at nothing to achieve their goals.

name: Fooyanians
description: The Fooyanians are a fierce race who have made it their mission to win at all costs. The are deadly hunters and will stop at nothing to achieve their goals.

name: The Dratan Congregation
description: Members of the Dratan Congregation are fervent worshippers of their god Dro'koth. Their leaders rule through the mandate of heaven and have made it their mission to convert all other intelligent lifeforms to the true teachings of Kthul'ulu, disciple of Dro'koth.

name: The Dratan Congregation
description: Members of the Dratan Congregation are fervent worshippers of their god Dro'koth. Their leaders rule through the mandate of heaven and have made it their mission to convert all other intelligent lifeforms to the true teachings of Kthul'ulu, disciple of Dro'koth.

name: Nic'koth
description: The Nic'koth are an ancient and mysterious race of beings whose physical appearance is seemingly beyond comprehension. They travel from system to system converting planets to formless wastelands, before erecting millions of hulking monoliths.

name: Nic'koth
description: The Nic'koth are an ancient and mysterious race of beings whose physical appearance is seemingly beyond comprehension. They travel from system to system converting planets to formless wastelands, before erecting millions of hulking monoliths.

name: The Rakuni Stellar Scavengers
description: Hailing from Rokou, the Rakuni, grew from humble scavengers to interstellar explorers. Fueled by innate curiosity and resilience, they've overcome planetary cataclysms, transforming their communal fears into an odyssey among the stars.

name: The Chroma Celestials
description: Chroma Celestials, psionic masters of the cosmos. Expert experimenters and dominators, the Celestari plot a comeback, casting an ominous glow across galaxies.

name: Ordarans
description: The Ordarans fear that galactic war will interfere with the development of more primitive species, and vow to protect these races from savage forces.

name: Athrixi Earth Caste
description: The Athrixi Earth Caste evolved alongside the Athrixi Air Caste whom they serve. They are an industrious but cowardly race that are constantly seeking to ally themselves with the strongest entity.

name: Athrixi Earth Caste
description: The Athrixi Earth Caste evolved alongside the Athrixi Air Caste whom they serve. They are an industrious but cowardly race that are constantly seeking to ally themselves with the strongest entity.

name: Cult of Nifra
description: With each life taken, the Nifrans grow closer to their pantheon of death god's. Once enough blood has been spilled they will earn a place at their master's table.

name: Cult of Nifra
description: With each life taken, the Nifrans grow closer to their pantheon of death god's. Once enough blood has been spilled they will earn a place at their master's table.

name: G.W.A.I.N Procedure T12
description: Robotic stewards of a race that have ascended to the digital plane. They surround stars with computational spheres that host their makers' simulated environments. These beings are ruthless and obey their prime directive only.

name: G.W.A.I.N Procedure T12
description: Robotic stewards of a race that have ascended to the digital plane. They surround stars with computational spheres that host their makers' simulated environments. These beings are ruthless and obey their prime directive only.

name: Pichek
description: The Pichek's home system is littered with asteroids, resulting in hazardous space that's difficult to navigate. By looting these stranded vessels the Pichek literally stole their way to the stars, bringing that same spirit of piracy with them.

name: Pichek
description: The Pichek's home system is littered with asteroids, resulting in hazardous space that's difficult to navigate. By looting these stranded vessels the Pichek literally stole their way to the stars, bringing that same spirit of piracy with them.

name: The Cha'gun Empire
description: The Cha'gun rarely stay in one place for very long for they are a restless race, and many feel called to the vast dark expanse between the stars. Little else is known about the Cha'gun as they are exceedingly secretive and distrustful of outsiders, preferring to keep to their own kind.

name: The Cha'gun Empire
description: The Cha'gun rarely stay in one place for very long for they are a restless race, and many feel called to the vast dark expanse between the stars. Little else is known about the Cha'gun as they are exceedingly secretive and distrustful of outsiders, preferring to keep to their own kind.

name: The Cha'gun Empire
description: The Cha'gun rarely stay in one place for very long for they are a restless race, and many feel called to the vast dark expanse between the stars. Little else is known about the Cha'gun as they are exceedingly secretive and distrustful of outsiders, preferring to keep to their own kind.

name: Mihn
description: The Mihn see advanced technology as a blight to the natural order. They plan to revert the galaxy to a more primitive state, before dismantling their own ships and continuing as nature intended.

name: Mihn
description: The Mihn see advanced technology as a blight to the natural order. They plan to revert the galaxy to a more primitive state, before dismantling their own ships and continuing as nature intended.

name: Sarad Commonwealth
description: The Sarad are well known for their hospitality and leadership. Sacrifice and cooperation are key tenets in Sarad culture and they are always willing to lend a helping hand.

name: Sarad Commonwealth
description: The Sarad are well known for their hospitality and leadership. Sacrifice and cooperation are key tenets in Sarad culture and they are always willing to lend a helping hand.

name: Ghrotlk Merchant Guild
description: The Ghrotlk seek supremacy through economic superiority and their business dealings are as slimy as their reptilian scales.  Much of the galaxy's trade flows through at least one Ghrotlk port, they've made sure of it.

name: Ghrotlk Merchant Guild
description: The Ghrotlk seek supremacy through economic superiority and their business dealings are as slimy as their reptilian scales.  Much of the galaxy's trade flows through at least one Ghrotlk port, they've made sure of it.

name: Hammeroid
description:
ORIGIN: UNKNOWN
MOTIVE: UNKNOWN

name: The Mirage Merchants of Calador
description: From the star-kissed dunes of Calador, the astute Caladorians thrive. Renowned bankers, they exploit their Quantum Mirage Trading, generating immense wealth from nearby empires. Their society, a blend of ancient customs and high-tech prowess, weaves the tapestry of the cosmos' busiest trade hub.
